ONLY the outfit: Here is the detailed prompt description for the outfit, suitable for image generation:

**A full body set of high-fantasy Xianxia battle robes and armor displayed on an invisible mannequin. The outfit consists of deep midnight blue and charcoal black layered fabric with a traditional cross-collar design. Key features include segmented, rounded dark shoulder pauldrons with distinct gold metallic rims. The arms feature detailed, textured dragon-scale gauntlets in dark grey covering the hands and forearms with metallic wrist cuffs. A wide fabric sash belts the waist. The lower section comprises flowing, long robe skirting and loose trousers. Hyper-realistic 3D render style, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, isolated on a plain white studio background.**. Professional flat lay clothing photography on white background, 8k.
